author: Special Correspondent
text:
There will be no power supply between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. on Thursday in the following areas served by the Mariamman temple sub station because of routine maintenance works.

The areas are Punnainallur Mariamman temple, Gnanam Nagar, Bypass, Sidhar Kadu, Kadakadappai, Kalakkudi, Alangudi, Nettanallur, Nellithope, Edavakkudi, Kanthavanam, Kulichapattu, Panankadu, Annai Indra Nagar, Mariyal, Thillai, RMS Colony, and Postal Colony, according to a Tangedco release here on Tuesday.
title: Power shutdown
